section.title: Configure Uniscribe Support
section.para: Keyman Desktop will detect if your Uniscribe version is out of date. Keyman Desktop includes an updated version of Uniscribe, but it does not currently update the version on your system.

Uniscribe controls the display of complex script fonts on your computer, for scripts such as Devanagari, Tamil, Khmer, Tibetan or Mongolian. Microsoft periodically release new versions of Uniscribe but these are not typically made available on older operating systems.
